verses.roman:
ei saba guṇa lañā muni vaiśampāyana
sahasra-nāme kaila tāṅra nāma-gaṇana

synonyms: ei—these; saba—all; guṇa—qualities; lañā—taking; muni—the sage; vaiśampāyana—named Vaiśampāyana; sahasra-nāme—in the Viṣṇu-sahasra-nāma; kaila—did; tāṅra—of Him; nāma-gaṇana—counting of the name.
translation: Recording all these qualities of Lord Caitanya, the sage Vaiśampāyana included His name in the Viṣṇu-sahasra-nāma.
